revision.comment: Rescuing 1 sources and tagging 0 as dead. #IABot (v1.5beta)
revision.text:
[[File:1 Live Krone 2013 Bülent Ceylan 1.jpg|thumb|''Bülent Ceylan'' 2013]] [[File:Ceylan-buelent.JPG|thumb|Advertisement for Bülent Ceylans DVD on a Mannheim tram]] '''Bülent Ceylan''' (born 4 January 1976 in [[Mannheim]]) is a German [[comedian]] and [[Kabarett]] artist.
== Life == His mother Hilde is German, his father Ahmet Ceylan († 29 October 2012) was Turkish. Bülent Ceylan has three older siblings.<ref>[http://www.express.de/promi-show/fuer-seine-neue-show-buelent-macht-mama-hilde-zum-tv-star,2186,28299304.html "Bülent makes Mama Hilde a TV-Star"]</ref>
Ceylan attended ''Friedrich-Ebert-Grundschule'' and ''Ludwig-Frank-[[Gymnasium (Germany)|Gymnasium]]'' in Mannheim. In his eleventh year he had a performance parodying [[Boris Becker]], which was very well received by teachers and students.<ref>SR: ''Bülent Ceylan. Der Monnemer Türk'' (= the Turk from Mannheim) in MEIER, October 2011</ref>
After the [[Abitur]] in 1995 he did an internship with the music station [[VIVA Germany|VIVA]] and the [[Rhineland-Palatinate]] radio station RPR1. In the beginning he performed on small stages, afterwards he studied philosophy and political science but quit university in favor of his career.
In November 2002 he started the successful program ''Döner for one'' (blend of [[Doner Kebab|Döner]] and ''[[Dinner for one]]''), with which he achieved the national breakthrough.
The premiere of his programme ''halb getürkt'' (wordplay: "getürkt" is colloquial for "faked", but Ceylan is also half Turkish) was broadcast on [[ZDF]] in July 2006. In 2007 there followed the program "Kebabbel net" (blend of [[Kebab]] and "babbel net" meaning ''Stop talking (crap)'' in the dialect of Mannheim) which was later recorded and broadcast by [[RTL Television|RTL]] in 2009. This brought him the [[Deutscher Comedypreis|"Deutschen Comedypreis"]] in the category Newcomer and the "CIVIS-Medienpreis" for integration in May 2010. At the same time Ceylan celebrated the premiere of his program "Ganz schön turbülent" (blend of ''turbulent'' and his name) for which he was awarded the "Deutschen Comedypreis" as best comedian in 2010. Ceylan started his program "Wilde Kreatürken" (blend of "Kreaturen" = ''creatures'' and "Türken" = ''Turks'') in 2011, RTL broadcast it in 2012. His next program "HAARDROCK" (blend of ''Hardrock'' and "Haar" = "hair" referring to his long hair) premiered in January 2014.
Bülent Ceylan has appeared in numerous German TV shows like [[Quatsch Comedy Club]]. He develops his programs mainly together with [[Roland Junghans]]. As an actor, he played Mustafa in several episodes of the series [[Hausmeister Krause]] and as Jonny, a main character in the [[sitcom]] [[Bewegte Männer]]. On 6 June 2008, he joined [[Stefan Raab]]s "Autoball-EM" playing for Turkey. His stage show ''Bülent Ceylan – live'' was broadcast on [[RTL Television]] on Saturday, 26 September 2009. On 21 August 2010 Ceylan appeared at the 'Summer Breeze' metal festival. On 19 February 2011 "Die Bülent Ceylan Show" started on RTL Television. Its first season consisted of six episodes.<ref>[http://www.mediabolo.de/german/zuschauer/aktuelle_projekte/index.html?AKTION=INFOSND&ID=123 Die Bülent Ceylan Show] {{webarchive |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120101002219/http://www.mediabolo.de/german/zuschauer/aktuelle_projekte/index.html?AKTION=INFOSND&ID=123 |date=January 1, 2012 }}</ref> <ref>[http://www.wz-newsline.de/home/gesellschaft/leute/der-comedian-mit-rockerherz-buelent-ceylan-1.581328 "The Comedian with the heart of a rocker"]</ref> Bülent Ceylan appeared on the [[Wacken Open Air]] in August 2011.<ref>http://www.schwaebische-post.de/557938/</ref>
Bülent Ceylan plays several comic roles with frequent themes being the quirks of Germans from Turkish family backgrounds and people from Mannheim.
Bülent Ceylan is married and has a daughter.<ref>[http://www.augstein-pr.de/content/pdf/interview_ceylan.pdf Interview with Ceylan on the website „Wort Text Bild Publiktation“] {{webarchive |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120324155907/http://www.augstein-pr.de/content/pdf/interview_ceylan.pdf |date=March 24, 2012 }} (retrieved 2 January 2012)</ref>
==Miscellaneous== Ceylan stated in several interviews that he has a [[foot fetish]].<ref>{{cite web|title=Focus: Interview mit Comedian Bülent Ceylan: Ich bin Fussfetischist|url=http://www.focus.de/kultur/kino_tv/interview-mit-comedian-buelent-ceylan-ich-bin-fussfetischist_aid_760375.html}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|title=VIP.de: Bülent Ceylan: "Ich bin Fussfetischist"|url=http://www.vip.de/cms/buelent-ceylan-ich-bin-ein-fussfetischist-1118042.html}}</ref>
== Awards == * 2001 [[Bielefeld]]er Kabarettpreis * 2002 [[Kleinkunstpreis Baden-Württemberg]] * 2009 [[Deutscher Comedypreis]]: ''Best Newcomer'' * 2010 Civis Medienpreis<ref>[http://www.civismedia.eu/tv/civis/02wettbewerbe67.phtml#02 Civis media award] {{webarchive |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20100510231747/http://www.civismedia.eu/tv/civis/02wettbewerbe67.phtml#02 |date=May 10, 2010 }}</ref> * 2011 [[Goldene Schallplatte]] for the DVD ''Bülent Ceylan - Live!'' * 2011 [[Goldene Schallplatte]] for the DVD ''Ganz schön Turbülent'' * 2011 [[Deutscher Comedypreis]]: ''Best Comedian''
== Programs == * Döner for one – mit alles (premiere: November 2002, Capitol Mannheim) * Halb getürkt (Premiere: Oktober 2005, Rosengarten Mannheim) * Kebabbel net (Premiere: September 2007, Capitol Mannheim) * Ganz schön turbülent! (Premiere: Oktober 2009, Capitol Mannheim) * Wilde Kreatürken (Start: Oktober 2011, Capitol Mannheim)
=== DVDs === * Halb getürkt, Köln : WortArt, 2006 * Bülent Ceylan – live, Mannheim,(18 September 2009) * Bülent Ceylan – Ganz schön turbülent (22 October 2010)
=== Audio CDs === * Produzier’ mich net!, 2000 * Döner for one, Berlin: Blue Cat Print und Music, 2003 * Halb getürkt, Köln: WortArt, 2006 * Kebabbel net, 2008 * Ganz schön Turbülent, 2010
